title: Lead Workshops and Talks
description: I enjoy sharing what I know by leading talks and workshops in my local community about my favorite web development topics.

title: Organize Community Events
description: I volunteer as a Director for my local Women Who Code chapter, and lead an event called Puppies & Portfolios.

title: Doodle and Create Things
description: Before I got into programming, I mostly dabbled in the arts. I love photography, sketching, painting, and creating graphic arts.
